en.LongName: Optical satellite images (SPOT 1-6 and Pleiades HR) - Airbus Defence and Space
en.Description: With any point on Earth covered at least once a day, Airbus Defence and Space provides unrivalled access to the most comprehensive range of commercial Earth observation data available today. Our data products comprise imagery acquired by the Pléiades constellation, the SPOT constellation, TerraSAR-X, TanDEM-X and from partner satellites such as FORMOSAT-2 and DEIMOS-1.
en.Query: Images on Toulouse acquired in december 2013
en.Attribution: Images courtesy of Airbus Defence and Space. Copyright 2014, All Rights Reserved

fr.ShortName: Image satellite à Très Haute Résolution
fr.LongName: Images satellite optique (SPOT 1-6 and Pleiades HR) - Airbus Defence and Space
fr.Description: Grâce à des images quotidiennes de chaque recoin de la planète, Airbus Defence and Space fournit un accès inégalé au plus large spectre de données commerciales d’observation de la Terre disponible à ce jour. Nos produits comprennent des images acquises par la constellation Pléiades, la constellation SPOT et les satellites TerraSAR-X et TanDEM-X, ainsi que des images issues de nos satellites partenaires, FORMOSAT-2 et DEIMOS-1.
fr.Query: Images acquises sur Toulouse en décembre 2013
fr.Attribution: Images courtesy of Airbus Defence and Space. Copyright 2014, All Rights Reserved
